{"id":745873564,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"10 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1657696712,"status":15,"status_display":"Runtime Error","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/745873564/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find Pivot Index","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    \n    int pivotIndex(vector<int>& nums) {\n        int prefSum[10000];\n        prefSum[0] = 0;\n        int n = nums.size();\n        \n        for(int i=1; i<=n; i++) {\n            prefSum[i] = prefSum[i-1] + nums[i-1];\n        }\n\n        for(int i=0; i<n; i++) {\n            int leftSum = prefSum[i];\n            int rightSum = prefSum[n] - prefSum[i] - nums[i];\n            \n            if(leftSum == rightSum) {\n                return i;\n            }\n        }\n        \n        return -1;\n        // 11\n        // 28 - 6 - 11 = 11\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-pivot-index","has_notes":false}
